item.cagedmobs.dna_sampler.tier2Info: Can be used on stronger entities

item.cagedmobs.dna_sampler.not_cachable: This type of entity cannot be sampled
item.cagedmobs.dna_sampler.not_sufficien: This DNA sampler is not strong enough to sample this entity

item.cagedmobs.arrow_upgrade.info: Kills entities inside the cage with arrows
item.cagedmobs.experience_upgrade.info: Entities killed inside the cage drop Crystallized Experience
item.cagedmobs.looting_upgrade.info: Applies Looting III to the cage drops
item.cagedmobs.upgrades.attach: Can be attached to the Mob Cages
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.envNotSuitable: The environment inside the cage is not suitable for this entity.
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.mainInfo: Can replicate entities' drops from stored DNA Sample
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.envInfo: Needs to have a suitable environment for the entity
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.hoppingInfo: Puts produced drops into inventory below
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.rightClickHarve: Right-click with a sword to harvest
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.hoppingCagesDis: Hopping Cages will work the same as non-hopping variant.
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.requiresWater: This entity requires a waterlogged cage.
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.envRequired: You need to set up an environment first.
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.cageAlreadyUsed: This cage has another entity's DNA inside.
block.cagedmobs.mob_cage.samplerNotSuffi: This sampler is not strong enough to get back entity from the cage.
